mn29:15.7: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:15.8: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:15.9: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:15.10: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:15.11: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:15.12: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:15.13: So tāya samādhisampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:15.14: So tena ñāṇadassanena attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:15.15: So tena ñāṇadassanena na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn29:15.16: So tena ñāṇadassanena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno asamayavimokkhaṃ ārādheti.
mn29:15.17: Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ so bhikkhu tāya asamayavimuttiyā parihāyetha.
mn29:16.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, nayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ lābhasakkārasilokānisaṃsaṃ, na sīlasampadānisaṃsaṃ, na samādhisampadānisaṃsaṃ, na ñāṇadassanānisaṃsaṃ.
mn29:16.2: Yā ca kho ayaṃ, bhikkhave, akuppā cetovimutti—
mn29:16.3: etadatthamidaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ, etaṃ sāraṃ etaṃ pariyosānan”ti.
mn29:17.2: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
